Description: From the original posting on the Gibson USA website: The model that replaced the original single-cutaway Les Paul Standard in 1961 was considered a more straight-on take on the solid body electric guitar...now, however, the introduction of the new SG Carved Top Autumn Burst – Gibson USA’s latest addition to its Limited Run Series – applies a large slice of elegance and painstaking luthiery to this already iconic rock guitar, making it the perfect marriage of Gibson’s heritage and innovation. Available beginning in early March 2009, the SG Carved Top will be produced in a strictly limited run of only 350 guitars, making it the ideal acquisition for both players and collectors alike. *This is the guitar I sued to record many of the guitar tracks on the In the Silence album A Fair Dream Gone Mad (Sensory Records). I am selling it to raise funds for a new album. Please bid well, and enjoy responsibly! This guitar is intoxicating.
Title: Gibson SG Custom Shop, Carved Top, Autumn Burst w case. #187 of 300 made!!!
